summary: I RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE FROM LEXUS LAST YEAR (NHTSA RECALL NO 16V-596) RE REAR LOWER SUSPENSION ARM (NO.1) ASSEMBLIES.  AS OF TODAY, WELL OVER SIX MONTHS LATER, LEXUS HAS BEEN UNABLE TO OFFER ME THIS FREE SERVICE TO CORRECT THE DEFECT.  I HAVE TRIED TO ARRANGE IT MULTIPLE TIMES OVER THE PAST 6+ MONTHS AND THEY CLAIM THEY ARE OUT OF THE PART(S).
